order_id.description: The ID of the associated order.

created_at.description: The date and time when the return was created.

decline.description: Additional information about the declined return.

note.description: The notification message sent to the customer about their declined return request. Maximum length: 500 characters.

reason.description: The reason the customer's return request was declined.

return_shipping_fees.description: The return shipping fees for the return.

id.description: The unique ID for the Fee.

amount_set.description: The unique ID for the Fee.

shop_money.description: The unique ID for the Fee.

amount.description: A monetary value in decimal format

currency.description: The three-letter currency code that represents a world currency used in a store.

presentment_money.description: The unique ID for the Fee.

amount.description: A monetary value in decimal format

currency.description: The three-letter currency code that represents a world currency used in a store.

return_line_items.description: The return shipping fees for the return.

id.description: The unique ID for the return line item.

customer_note.description: A note from the customer that describes the item to be returned. Maximum length: 300 characters.

refundable_quantity.description: The quantity that can be refunded.

return_reason.description: The reason for returning the item.

return_reason_note.description: Additional information about the reason for the return. Maximum length: 255 characters.

total_quantity.description: The sum of all return line item quantities for the return.

shop_url.description: URL of the shop where the return occurred
